document_data.mainbody:
A wand of metal and mineral detection was a magic item that revealed the location of metals.
The effective range of these wands was . A wand of metal and mineral detection would pulse in the wielders hand and point toward any detected source of metal or mineral. The wielder could also choose to concentrate on finding only a specific type of metal or mineral such as gold or diamond.
Korbus Brightjewel, a gnome jeweler who lived in Daggerford, owned a wand of metal and mineral detection.
